item.description:
Join NHCer Andrew to watch some Jazzfest performances at local Bars!  He will Host this meetup, phone number and details listed below:

Alive @ Five ended for the summer so some friends and I are getting our music fix through Jazz! The plan is to meet at Geronimo’s around 7:30 for dinner. If you cannot make it to the dinner, no biggie. Do try to come to the Jazzfest @ 116 Crown, where performing band M.O.B. will go on at 9:00 and keep you shakin’ your legs all night while the bar serves you smooth, cold beverages. Looking forward to a pleasant Thursday evening. Bring a friend, the more the merrier!

text if you need to get in touch with me about when/where to show up.

508-524-9988

7:30 George Baker at Geronimo's on Crown St, New Haven
No Cover.

9:00 Matt Oestreicher Group M.O.B 116 Crown, New Haven
No Cover. I called and asked them to reserve spots for us around 9:00. Tell them you're with Andrew.

http://www.jazzhaven.org/wc08092012.htm
item.name: Jazzfest @ Geronimo's & 116 Crown
